title: Searching for script
content:
Can anyone tell me what this script is that Herschel Supply Co uses?

author: macielmeza

comments.content: Can anyone tell me what this script is that Herschel Supply Co uses? I don't believe it is handwritten
Sorry to confirm your hunch but it looks hand-drawn too...
